name: infullview
overview:
infullview is a video interview platform revolutionizing how individuals apply for a job whilst streamlining the interview process.

Our aim to give businesses and individuals the opportunity to be seen in a true light. We want to take the assumption out of the current process and replace it with clear, transparent communication, speeding up the decision making process for both parties.

Businesses finally have the ability to see candidates via video instead of a resume. They set the questions for the candidate to answer too saving huge amounts of time and money via our simple and easy to use platform. Candidates as well have the opportunity to read and see more about the company and hiring manager.

infullview also allows businesses and individuals to reach larger audiences while giving a more complete insight of themselves, therefore cutting out the time spent meeting the wrong people.

Put simply, infullview is changing the way people meet.
